issue.title: relation of type resource has changed the way to store XML
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

In the 4.0.x version, the xml generated by a resourse type relation was like this : 
<gmd:pointOfContact xlink:show="embed" xlink:actuate="onLoad" xlink:type="simple" xlink:href="http://lebouzin:8080/proxy_cg32/geonetwork?request=GetRecordById&service=CSW&version=2.0.2&elementSetName=full&outputschema=csw:IsoRecord&id=67955e93-6225-9b54-99d1-56f55e924cac&fragment=gmd%3Acontact" />

In the 4.2.x version, it has changed as : 
<gmd:pointOfContact xlink:show="embed" xlink:actuate="onLoad" xlink:type="simple" xlink:href="http://lebouzin:8080/proxy_cg32/geonetwork?request=GetRecordById&service=CSW&version=2.0.2&elementSetName=full&outputschema=csw:IsoRecord&id=67955e93-6225-9b54-99d1-56f55e924cac&fragment=gmd%3Acontact">
        <gmd:MD_IdentificationpointOfContact />
      </gmd:pointOfContact>

The resources saved in 4.0.x are not selected by default in the metadata form when I edit a metadata

comments.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

Ok, it was due to the class association that wasn't taken into account before.
